instruction: Compose a tweet that highlights the key points of the article "AI and Machine Learning in the Workplace".
output: The emergence of #AI and #MachineLearning technologies are transforming the job market, forcing employers to look for people with the skills to understand and leverage them. Read the article to learn more about this evolving job market: https://www.bls.gov/careeroutlook/2018/article/ai-and-machine-learning-in-the-workplace.htm
